mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM (SELECT m.*, mi.movieImage_filename,rownum FROM movie m, movieImage mi WHERE m.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND mi.MOVIEIMAGE_FILETYPE='main' ORDER BY rownum) T WHERE rownum<16 and movie_isshow='y'

SELECT T.* FROM (SELECT m.*, mi.movieImage_filename, mi.movieimage_filetype FROM movie m, movieImage mi WHERE m.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND mi.MOVIEIMAGE_FILETYPE='main' ORDER BY MI.MOVIEIMAGE_CREATED DESC) T WHERE movie_id =#{movie_id} and movie_isshow='y'

SELECT T.* FROM (SELECT m.*, mi.movieImage_filename, mi.movieimage_filetype FROM movie m, movieImage mi WHERE m.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND mi.MOVIEIMAGE_FILETYPE='sub' ORDER BY MI.MOVIEIMAGE_CREATED DESC) T WHERE movie_id =#{movie_id} and movie_isshow='y'
